long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌐 Kitamersion a simple immersion tracking tool. Primarily for language learning immersion. 🎓

🌟 Features

🎥 Add videos to your list with a simple shortcut (Shift+A)
🏷️ Organize with tags
⏱️ Keep track of your total watch time (daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly)
📊 Dive into your immersion with the statistics page (and view all items)
🏷️🔮 Auto-apply tags based on origin
🚪 Isolation window mode (pop-out window)
💻 Open source on GitHub


🔗 Integration (Unofficial)

📚 AniList (Visualize stats coming soon...)
🤖 TheMoeWay immersion bot: copy & paste from the past 24 hours (without optional comment)
